dcterms:creator: F. Sener
D. Chatterjee
D. Shelepov
K. He
D. Singhania
R. Wang
A. Yao
dcterms:description: A large-scale multi-view video dataset for understanding procedural activities, annotated with 46286 action segments for the training set and 21900 action segments for the test set. It includes 90 objects and 24 interaction verbs, forming a total of 1380 fine-grained actions.
dcterms:title: Assemble101 Dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis, containing 56,578 samples covering 60 action labels, focusing on skeleton-based action recognition.
dcterms:title: NTU60-Interaction Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Liu
A. Shahroudy
M. Perez
G. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
A. C. Kot
dcterms:description: A large-scale benchmark for 3D human activity understanding, built upon the original NTU-RGB+D dataset, containing 113,945 samples covering 120 action labels.
dcterms:title: NTU120-Interaction Dataset
